channel.title: Beyond Repair - Officially Thomas
channel.description:
YouTube: https://youtu.be/NtrDpxQvsA8
Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/track/5T2p4vOAetdRpHeK0fOadd?si=66JBOm0pRfa9RgFEBFuL9Q
SoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/that_dj_thomas/beyond-repair?ref=clipboard&p=i&c=1
Beyond Repair is now out on all platforms!
It is the 1st single from my upcoming project! The album has a storyline:
This song is where I confront a girlfriend AFTER my friend caught her cheating on me. She admits it and now I am enraged and deeply heartbroken. There’s a key change in the song where I consider forgiving her but I decide “oh forget this, I’m not forgiving her!”
